input.sentences: this small town is absolutely gorgeous .
inside the city holds little markets run by commoners .
a large portion of the population get around on bikes since the town is so small .
the insides of the buildings are a sight to see as well . it is truly a beautiful town .
output.sentences: When we arrived in the town, we were blown away by the gorgeous view despite the absolutely terrible weather.
We took a quick run to the markets but were forced inside by the rain.
In the town, a good portion of the population rode bikes.
This stunning building showed off the historic architecture of the town.
This hidden gem in town was a sight to behold when we got to see the insides.
